events.name: UK financial market reacts to tax-cutting measures
events.wd_label: UK financial market reacts to tax-cutting measures
events.wd_description: The financial market reacted to the biggest tax-cutting moves in 50 years as the pound fell to a 37-year low against the dollar and UK stocks dropped following Chancellor Kwasi Kwarteng's announcement of tax cuts and economic measures.
events.description: The financial market reacted to the biggest tax-cutting moves in 50 years as the pound fell to a 37-year low against the dollar and UK stocks dropped following Chancellor Kwasi Kwarteng's announcement of tax cuts and economic measures.

events.name: fall of the pound
events.wd_description: The pound fell to a fresh 37-year low against the dollar, dropping below $1.09 after falling more than 3% against the dollar and more than 1% against the euro.
events.description: The pound fell to a fresh 37-year low against the dollar, dropping below $1.09 after falling more than 3% against the dollar and more than 1% against the euro.

events.name: UK stocks drop
events.wd_description: UK stocks dropped after Chancellor Kwasi Kwarteng outlined a series of tax cuts and economic measures in a significant shake-up of the country’s finances.
events.description: UK stocks dropped after Chancellor Kwasi Kwarteng outlined a series of tax cuts and economic measures in a significant shake-up of the country’s finances.

events.name: analysts' expectations
events.wd_description: Analysts expect the UK interest rate to hit 5.2% by August 2023, with high expectations of a one percentage point interest rate hike at the next Bank of England meeting in November.
events.description: Analysts expect the UK interest rate to hit 5.2% by August 2023, with high expectations of a one percentage point interest rate hike at the next Bank of England meeting in November.

events.name: Ukraine gains ground in Kharkiv counteroffensive
events.wd_label: Ukraine gains ground in Kharkiv counteroffensive
events.wd_description: Ukrainian military confirmed significant gains in a counteroffensive in the north-eastern Kharkiv region, with President Zelenskiy announcing the reclamation of a vital city and repelling Russian offensives.
events.description: Ukrainian military confirmed significant gains in a counteroffensive in the north-eastern Kharkiv region, with President Zelenskiy announcing the reclamation of a vital city and repelling Russian offensives.

events.name: Zelenskiy's announcement
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy announced that Ukrainian forces have reclaimed a vital city in the Kharkiv region and are repelling Russian offensives across the country.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy announced that Ukrainian forces have reclaimed a vital city in the Kharkiv region and are repelling Russian offensives across the country.

events.name: video of Ukrainian soldiers
events.wd_description: Zelenskiy posted a video of Ukrainian soldiers standing above a building in Balakliia, held by the Russians for six months, with the Ukrainian flag.
events.description: Zelenskiy posted a video of Ukrainian soldiers standing above a building in Balakliia, held by the Russians for six months, with the Ukrainian flag.

events.name: reclamation of Balakliia
events.wd_description: Ukrainian forces reclaimed the key city of Balakliia in the Kharkiv region, which had been held by Russian forces for six months.
events.description: Ukrainian forces reclaimed the key city of Balakliia in the Kharkiv region, which had been held by Russian forces for six months.

events.name: Ukrainian troops reaching Kupyansk
events.wd_description: Ukrainian troops reached the city of Kupyansk, a key logistics and supply hub for Russian forces, though the city is yet to be fully retaken by Ukrainian forces.
events.description: Ukrainian troops reached the city of Kupyansk, a key logistics and supply hub for Russian forces, though the city is yet to be fully retaken by Ukrainian forces.

events.name: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_label: Ranil Wickremesinghe elected President of Sri Lanka
events.wd_description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.
events.description: Former Sri Lanka Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe was elected President by lawmakers amid ongoing protests demanding his removal due to his association with former President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

events.name: election of Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.
events.description: Ranil Wickremesinghe, a six-time former prime minister and ally of Gotabaya Rajapaksa, was elected President of Sri Lanka by lawmakers, receiving 134 out of 223 votes.

events.name: Wickremesinghe's address
events.wd_description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.
events.description: After being elected, Wickremesinghe addressed the country, emphasizing the need for unity and cooperation despite the division along party lines.

events.name: protest against Wickremesinghe
events.wd_description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.
events.description: A small group of protesters gathered at the president's residence to protest Wickremesinghe's nomination during the voting process.

events.name: EV battery supply chain sustainability
events.wd_description: Efforts and strategies to develop a sustainable supply chain for EV batteries, addressing current challenges and future needs for materials and technology.
events.description: Efforts and strategies to develop a sustainable supply chain for EV batteries, addressing current challenges and future needs for materials and technology.

events.name: securing suppliers
events.wd_description: Steps to secure alternative suppliers for lithium batteries to reduce dependency on Chinese firms and ensure a resilient supply chain.
events.description: Steps to secure alternative suppliers for lithium batteries to reduce dependency on Chinese firms and ensure a resilient supply chain.

events.name: t: partnerships with Korea and Japan
events.wd_label: t: partnerships with Korea and Japan
events.wd_description: Securing lithium battery supplies from Korea’s LG Chem and Japan’s Panasonic as alternatives to Chinese firms.
events.description: Securing lithium battery supplies from Korea’s LG Chem and Japan’s Panasonic as alternatives to Chinese firms.

events.name: t: friend-shoring agenda
events.wd_description: Aligning with U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen’s agenda to trade with trusted partners, dividing countries into friends or foes.
events.description: Aligning with U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen’s agenda to trade with trusted partners, dividing countries into friends or foes.

events.name: incentive programs
events.wd_description: Developing government incentive programs to support the production of EV batteries in the United States, similar to the CHIPS Act for semiconductors.
events.description: Developing government incentive programs to support the production of EV batteries in the United States, similar to the CHIPS Act for semiconductors.

events.name: t: European Union initiatives
events.wd_description: The European Union's allocation of $3.5 billion to support battery manufacturing and research to reduce dependency on Asian suppliers.
events.description: The European Union's allocation of $3.5 billion to support battery manufacturing and research to reduce dependency on Asian suppliers.

events.name: t: U.S. initiatives
events.wd_description: The need for more government support in the U.S. to create a thriving EV battery industry, with examples like General Motors and LG Chem's plant in Ohio.
events.description: The need for more government support in the U.S. to create a thriving EV battery industry, with examples like General Motors and LG Chem's plant in Ohio.

events.name: increasing raw material supply
events.wd_description: Efforts to increase the supply of essential minerals like lithium and cobalt for EV batteries to meet growing demand.
events.description: Efforts to increase the supply of essential minerals like lithium and cobalt for EV batteries to meet growing demand.

events.name: t: lithium supply
events.wd_description: Strategies to increase lithium supply, including leveraging U.S. reserves and investments in mining operations.
events.description: Strategies to increase lithium supply, including leveraging U.S. reserves and investments in mining operations.

events.name: vent: U.S. lithium reserves
events.wd_description: The United States has about 10% of the world's lithium reserves, with significant deposits in states like Nevada and North Carolina.
events.description: The United States has about 10% of the world's lithium reserves, with significant deposits in states like Nevada and North Carolina.

events.name: vent: General Motors investment
events.wd_description: General Motors' multi-million dollar investment in Controlled Thermal Resources to extract lithium from California’s Salton Sea Geothermal Field.
events.description: General Motors' multi-million dollar investment in Controlled Thermal Resources to extract lithium from California’s Salton Sea Geothermal Field.

events.name: t: cobalt supply
events.wd_description: Challenges in securing cobalt supply due to geopolitical issues, with most cobalt coming from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
events.description: Challenges in securing cobalt supply due to geopolitical issues, with most cobalt coming from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

events.name: vent: Chinese control in Congo
events.wd_description: Chinese firms own or have stakes in most of Congo’s cobalt-producing mines, complicating efforts to secure cobalt supply ethically.
events.description: Chinese firms own or have stakes in most of Congo’s cobalt-producing mines, complicating efforts to secure cobalt supply ethically.

events.name: developing alternative technologies
events.wd_description: Research and development of alternative battery technologies that reduce or eliminate the use of lithium or cobalt to create a sustainable supply chain.
events.description: Research and development of alternative battery technologies that reduce or eliminate the use of lithium or cobalt to create a sustainable supply chain.

events.name: t: cobalt-free batteries
events.wd_description: Development of cobalt-free batteries by companies like Tesla in partnership with CATL and research by Oak Ridge National Laboratory.
events.description: Development of cobalt-free batteries by companies like Tesla in partnership with CATL and research by Oak Ridge National Laboratory.

events.name: t: solid-state batteries
events.wd_description: Development of solid-state batteries by Toyota, which are lighter and have faster charging properties.
events.description: Development of solid-state batteries by Toyota, which are lighter and have faster charging properties.

events.name: t: government support
events.wd_description: The necessity of government support to stimulate collaborations between private firms and research centers to develop innovative, sustainable EV batteries.
events.description: The necessity of government support to stimulate collaborations between private firms and research centers to develop innovative, sustainable EV batteries.
